author: Franjo Zizek
quote: Let them look, maybe they will learn something.

author: Richard Feynman
quote: I have approximate answers and possible beliefs and different degrees of certainty about different things, but I'm not absolutely sure of anything and of many things I don't know anything about.

author: Faust
quote: Achieving perfection is hard but remaining perfect is impossible.

author: T.S. Eliot
quote: Only those who will risk going too far can
possibly find out how far one can go.

author: Don Herold
quote: The brighter you are, the more you have to learn.

author: Michelangelo
quote: I am still learning.

author: Salvador Dali
quote: The only difference between a mad man and me is that I'm not mad.

author: Alfred North Whitehead
quote: Civilizations advance by extending the number of important operations which we can perform without thinking about them.

author: Joseph Heller, Catch 22
quote: 'They're trying to kill me,' Yossarian told him calmly.
'No one's trying to kill you,' Clevinger cried.
'Then why are they shooting at me?' Yossarian asked.
'They're shooting at everyone,' Clevinger answered.
'They're trying to kill everyone.' And what difference does that make?

author: Jacque Fresco
quote: Nothing can be frozen and kept that way. Everything keeps changing. There are no final frontiers.

author: M. C. Escher
quote: Are you really sure that a floor can't also be a ceiling?

author: C. S. Lewis
quote: Someday you will be old enough to start reading fairy tales again.

author: Pablo Picasso
quote: The world doesn't make sense so why should I paint pictures that do.

author: Pablo Picasso
quote: I begin with an idea and then it becomes something else.

author: Timothy Leary
quote: The more conscious and intelligent you become, the more you want to become even more conscious and intelligent.

author: Faraday
quote: But still try, for who knows what is possible?
